THE SAN ANTONIO SPURS will not let Kawhi Leonard join the Los Angeles Lakers because it could then lead to LeBron James also heading to their west coast rivals.

“Not only do the Spurs not want to give Kawhi what he wants and send him to a conference rival, they don’t want to strengthen a conference rival in any way,” Broussard said on The Herd.

“So they don’t want LeBron going there either.”

He added: “There is no reason for the Spurs to make a trade in the next two weeks.
